channel.title: How do I make my client load faster? (Erasedpkz)
channel.description: Yeah, as most of you know, any of the erasedpkz leaches (or erasedpkz itself) takes an incredibly long time to load, which I would think personally would take about 30-70% of your players away ("I'll just go play ..."). If anyone could help me, that would be great. [size=12pt]BTW, I do NOT intend at all to fix that and then put my server up, I want to add everything I think people would like, and then take suggestions on what people would want (I don't wanna be one of those fags who just takes an erasedpkz source and puts it online -.-)[/size] Thanks :D

item.title: How do I make my client load faster? (Erasedpkz)
item.dc:creator: @11j123 11j123
item.description:
@11j123 wrote:

imsuperman05:

Don’t use ErasedPkz. Cache is huge.

I wanted to take a base from around 09 and add chaotics, curses, dice, etc to it, could you recommend a good one? 317 or 508/525 would be fine

Yeah, as most of you know, any of the erasedpkz leaches (or erasedpkz itself) takes an incredibly long time to load, which I would think personally would take about 30-70% of your players away (“I’ll just go play …”). [size=12pt]BTW, I do NOT intend at all to fix that and then put my server up, I want to add everything I think people would like, and then take suggestions on what people would want (I don’t wanna be one of those fags who just takes an erasedpkz source and puts it online -.-)[/size] Thanks
